trans-unit.source: 64-bit Linux and Python 2.7, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, 3.7
64-bit Mac OSX 10.12+ with Python 2.7 or 3.6
trans-unit.target: 64位Mac OSX 10.12+,Python 2.7或3.6。

trans-unit.target: 64位Windows与Python 2.7和3.6。

trans-unit.source: astrobase is provided under the MIT License. See the LICENSE file for the full text.
trans-unit.target: astrobase 是根据MIT许可证提供的。有关全文，请参见LICENSE文件。

trans-unit.source: astrokep: contains functions for dealing with Kepler and K2 Mission light curves from STScI MAST (reading the FITS files, consolidating light curves for objects over quarters), and some basic operations (converting fluxes to mags, decorrelation of light curves, filtering light curves, and fitting object centroids for eclipse analysis, etc.)
trans-unit.target: astrokep：包含用于处理来自STScI MAST的开普勒和K2任务光曲线的功能（读取FITS文件，合并超过四分之一秒的物体的光曲线），以及一些基本操作（将磁通量转换为磁，光曲线的去相关，过滤光曲线，并拟合对象质心以进行日食分析等）

trans-unit.source: astrotess: contains functions for dealing with TESS 2-minute cadence light curves from STScI MAST (reading the FITS files, consolidating light curves for objects over sectors), and some basic operations (converting fluxes to mags, filtering light curves, etc.)
trans-unit.target: astrotess：包含用于处理来自STScI MAST的TESS 2分钟脚踏圈速光曲线的功能（读取FITS文件，合并扇区上物体的光曲线），以及一些基本操作（将通量转换为mags，过滤光曲线等）。

trans-unit.source: checkplot: contains functions to make checkplots: a grid of plots used to quickly decide if a period search for a possibly variable object was successful. Checkplots come in two forms:
trans-unit.target: checkplot：包含用于进行检查的功能：用于快速确定可能的可变对象的期间搜索是否成功的图表网格。支票有两种形式：

trans-unit.source: coordutils: functions for dealing with coordinates (conversions, distances, proper motion)
trans-unit.target: coordutils：用于处理坐标（转换，距离，适当运动）的函数

trans-unit.source: fakelcs: modules and functions to conduct an end-to-end variable star recovery simulation.
trans-unit.target: fakelcs：进行端到端可变恒星恢复模拟的模块和功能。

trans-unit.source: hatsurveys: modules to read, filter, and normalize light curves from various HAT surveys.
trans-unit.target: hatsurveys：用于读取，过滤和归一化来自各种HAT测量的光曲线的模块。

trans-unit.source: lcfit: functions for fitting light curve models to observations, including sinusoidal, trapezoidal and full Mandel-Agol planet transits, eclipses, and splines.
trans-unit.target: lcfit：用于将光曲线模型拟合到观测值的功能，包括正弦，梯形和完整的Mandel-Agol行星过境，日食和样条曲线。

trans-unit.source: lcmath: functions for light curve operations such as phasing, normalization, binning (in time and phase), sigma-clipping, external parameter decorrelation (EPD), etc.
trans-unit.target: lcmath：用于光曲线操作的功能，例如定相，归一化，合并（在时间和相位上），sigma-clipping，外部参数去相关（EPD）等。

trans-unit.source: lcmodels: first order models for fast fitting (for the purposes of variable classification) to various periodic variable types, including sinusoidal variables, eclipsing binaries, transiting planets, and flares.
trans-unit.target: lcmodels：一阶模型，用于快速拟合（出于变量分类的目的）各种周期性变量类型，包括正弦变量，日食双星，过渡行星和耀斑。

trans-unit.source: lcproc: driver functions for running an end-to-end pipeline including: (i) object selection from a collection of light curves by position, cross-matching to external catalogs, or light curve objectinfo keys, (ii) running variability feature calculation and detection, (iii) running period-finding, and (iv) object review using the checkplotserver webapp for variability classification.
trans-unit.target: lcproc：用于运行端到端管道的驱动程序功能，包括：（i）通过位置从光曲线集合中选择对象，与外部目录交叉匹配或光曲线objectinfo键，（ii）运行可变性特征计算和检测，（iii）运行期查找和（iv）使用checkplotserver webapp进行变量分类的对象检查。

trans-unit.source: periodbase: parallelized functions (using multiprocessing.map) to run fast period searches on light curves, including: the generalized Lomb-Scargle algorithm from Zechmeister & Kurster (2008; periodbase.zgls), the phase dispersion minimization algorithm from Stellingwerf (1978, 2011; periodbase.spdm), the AoV and AoV-multiharmonic algorithms from Schwarzenberg-Czerny (1989, 1996; periodbase.saov, periodbase.smav), the BLS algorithm from Kovacs et al. (2002; periodbase.kbls and periodbase.abls), the similar TLS algorithm from Hippke & Heller (2019; periodbase.htls), and the ACF period-finding algorithm from McQuillan et al. (2013a, 2014; periodbase.macf).
trans-unit.target: periodbase：并行化功能（使用 multiprocessing.map ）上运行光曲线快的周期的搜索，其中包括：从Zechmeister＆Kurster广义博士伦-Scargle算法（ 2008 ; periodbase.zgls），从Stellingwerf（相位分散最小化算法 1978， 2011 ; periodbase.spdm），距离Schwarzenberg-的Czerny（AOV的AOV和-算法多调和 1989， 1996年 ; periodbase.saov， periodbase.smav）时，从BLS科瓦奇等人的算法。 （ 2002年 ; periodbase.kbls 和 periodbase.abls），Hippke＆Heller（2019 ; periodbase.htls）的类似TLS算法以及McQuillan 等人的ACF周期发现算法。（2013a， 2014 ; periodbase.macf）。

trans-unit.source: plotbase: functions to plot light curves, phased light curves, periodograms, and download Digitized Sky Survey cutouts from the NASA SkyView service.
trans-unit.target: plotbase：用于绘制光曲线，相位光曲线，周期图以及从NASA SkyView服务下载数字化天空勘测图的功能。

trans-unit.source: services: modules and functions to query various astronomical catalogs and data services, including GAIA, SIMBAD, TRILEGAL, NASA SkyView, and 2MASS DUST.
trans-unit.target: 服务：用于查询各种天文目录和数据服务的模块和功能，包括GAIA，SIMBAD，TRILEGAL，NASA SkyView和2MASS DUST。

trans-unit.source: timeutils: functions for converting from Julian dates to Baryocentric Julian dates, and precessing coordinates between equinoxes and due to proper motion; this will automatically download and save the JPL ephemerides de430.bsp from JPL upon first import.
trans-unit.target: timeutils：用于从儒略日期转换为重心儒略日期的功能，并在春分点之间以及由于适当运动而进动坐标；首次导入时，它将自动从JPL下载并保存JPL星历表 de430.bsp。

trans-unit.source: varbase: functions for calculating auto-correlation features, masking and pre-whitening periodic signals in light curves, and planet transit specific tools.
trans-unit.target: varbase：用于计算自相关特征，掩蔽和预先变白光曲线中的周期性信号以及行星运输专用工具的功能。

trans-unit.source: varclass: functions for calculating various variability, stellar color and motion, and neighbor proximity features, along with a Random Forest based classifier.
trans-unit.target: varclass：用于计算各种可变性，恒星颜色和运动以及邻居邻近度特征的函数，以及基于随机森林的分类器。

trans-unit.source: A overview of the modules and subpackages is provided below.
trans-unit.target: 甲概述的模块和子包的提供如下。

trans-unit.source: Astrobase is a Python package for analyzing light curves and finding variable stars. It includes implementations of several period-finding algorithms, batch work drivers for working on large collections of light curves, and a small web-app useful for reviewing and classifying light curves by stellar variability type.
trans-unit.target: Astrobase是一个Python软件包,用于分析光曲线和查找变星。它包括几个周期查找算法的实现,用于处理大量光曲线集合的批处理驱动,以及一个小型的网络应用,用于按恒星变异性类型审查和分类光曲线。

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Contents
trans-unit.target: 内容

trans-unit.target: 对于可选功能,需要一些额外的包。

trans-unit.target: 如果你在用。

trans-unit.source: Install astrobase from the Python Package Index (PyPI):
trans-unit.target: 从Python软件包索引（PyPI）安装astrobase：

trans-unit.source: Install all the optional dependencies as well:
trans-unit.target: 同时安装所有可选的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Install the latest version (may be unstable at times):
trans-unit.target: 安装最新版本(有时可能不稳定)。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Installing with pip
trans-unit.target: 用管道安装

trans-unit.source: Jupyter notebooks that demonstrate some of the functionality are available in the astrobase-notebooks repository.
trans-unit.target: astrobase -notebooks 存储库中提供了演示某些功能的Jupyter笔记本。

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Most functions in this package that deal with light curves usually require three Numpy ndarrays as input: times, mags, and errs, so they should work with any time-series data that can be represented in this form. If you have flux time series measurements, most functions also take a magsarefluxes keyword argument that makes them handle flux light curves correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此程序包中处理光曲线的大多数函数通常需要三个Numpy ndarray作为输入： times ， mags 和 errs ，因此它们应使用可以以这种形式表示的任何时间序列数据。如果您具有通量时间序列测量值，则大多数函数还会采用 magsarefluxes 关键字参数，使它们正确处理通量光曲线。

trans-unit.source: Once that's done, install astrobase.
trans-unit.target: 完成后,安装 astrobase。

trans-unit.source: Other installation methods
trans-unit.target: 其他安装方法

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you'll need to make sure that a Fortran compiler and numpy are installed beforehand to compile the pyeebls package that astrobase depends on:
trans-unit.target: 否则,你需要确保事先安装了 Fortran 编译器和 numpy 来编译 astrobase 所依赖的 pyeebls 包。

trans-unit.source: PNG images: Alternatively, if you want to simply glance through lots of checkplots (e.g. for an initial look at a collection of light curves), there's a checkplot-viewer webapp available that operates on checkplot PNG images. The lightcurve-work Jupyter notebook goes through an example of generating these checkplot PNGs for light curves. See the checkplot-viewer.js file for more instructions and checkplot-viewer.png for a screenshot.
trans-unit.target: PNG图像：或者，如果您只想浏览许多检查图（例如，初步查看光曲线的集合），则可以使用可用于检查图PNG图像的 checkplot-viewer webapp。 Jupyter笔记本电脑的 光曲线工作演示了为光曲线生成这些检查图PNG的示例。见 checkplot-viewer.js更多的指示和文件checkplot-viewer.png 的屏幕截图。

trans-unit.source: Pillow
trans-unit.target: 枕头

trans-unit.source: Please see https://github.com/waqasbhatti/astrobase/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md for a list of changes applicable to tagged release versions.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅https://github.com/waqasbhatti/astrobase/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md，以获取适用于标记发行版的更改列表。

trans-unit.source: Python 3.6: Python 3.7: Python 3.8:
trans-unit.target: Python 3.6:Python 3.7:Python 3.8。

trans-unit.source: Python modules and scripts useful for variable star work in astronomy.
trans-unit.target: Python模块和脚本对天文学中的变星工作非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Python pickles: If you want to interactively browse through large numbers of checkplots (e.g., as part of a large variable star classification project), you can use the checkplotserver webapp that works on checkplot pickle files. This interface allows you to review all phased light curves from all period-finder methods applied, set and save variability tags, object type tags, best periods and epochs, and comments for each object using a browser-based UI (see below). The information entered can then be exported as CSV or JSON for the next stage of a variable star classification pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Python泡菜：如果要交互式浏览大量检查图（例如，作为大型可变星级分类项目的一部分），则可以使用可用于检查图泡菜文件的 checkplotserver Web应用程序。该界面允许您使用所有基于周期查找器的方法查看所有相光曲线，设置和保存可变性标签，对象类型标签，最佳周期和纪元，以及使用基于浏览器的UI（参见下文）针对每个对象的注释。输入的信息然后可以导出为CSV或JSON，用于下一阶段的可变星级分类管道。

trans-unit.source: Read the docs: https://astrobase.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
trans-unit.target: 阅读文档：https : //astrobase.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 所需经费

trans-unit.source: See the installation instructions below for details. This package requires Python >= 3.5 as of version 0.5.0. Use pip install astrobase<0.5.0 for older Python versions.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见下面的安装说明。从0.5.0版开始，此软件包需要Python> = 3.5。对于较旧的Python版本，请使用 pip install astrobase<0.5.0 。

trans-unit.source: The lightcurves-and-checkplots Jupyter notebook outlines how to do this. A more detailed example using light curves of an arbitrary format is available in the lc-collection-work notebook, which shows how to add in support for a custom LC format, add neighbor, cross-match, and color-mag diagram info to checkplots, and visualize these with the checkplotserver.
trans-unit.target: 该 lightcurves-和checkplots Jupyter笔记本概述了如何做到这一点。lc-collection-work 笔记本中提供了使用任意格式的光曲线的更详细的示例，该示例 显示了如何添加对自定义LC格式的支持，如何将邻居，交叉匹配和彩色磁图信息添加到检查图，并使用checkplotserver对其进行可视化。

trans-unit.source: This package requires the following other packages:
trans-unit.target: 这个软件包需要以下其他软件包。

trans-unit.source: You can simply install astrobase with:
trans-unit.target: 你可以简单地安装星基与。

trans-unit.source: astropy
trans-unit.target: 天体

trans-unit.source: for astrobase.lcdb to work, you'll need psycopg2-binary.
trans-unit.target: 为了使 astrobase.lcdb 正常工作，您需要 psycopg2-binary 。

trans-unit.source: for lcfit.transits.mandelagol_fit_magseries, you'll need batman-package, emcee, corner, and h5py.
trans-unit.target: 对于 lcfit.transits.mandelagol_fit_magseries ，您将需要 batman-package ， emcee ， corner 和 h5py 。

trans-unit.source: for lcproc.awsrun, you'll need paramiko, boto3, and awscli.
trans-unit.target: 对于 lcproc.awsrun ，您将需要 paramiko ， boto3 和 awscli 。

trans-unit.source: for periodbase.tls, you'll need transitleastsquares
trans-unit.target: 对于 periodbase.tls ，您需要 transitleastsquares
